name: Polyshics (PIKStudio Offical Itch.io)
description:
Made for the One Month Unity Challenge.

This game was submitted a little late, but I submitted it now! :D

INSTRUCTIONS: There are two difficulties plus a speedrun mode. There is no in-game death screen, but in speedrun mode, there is a stopwatch.

This game might not be working well,  but it does.

If you're having problems on playing on Mac(which you probably will), then do this:

  1. Go to Terminal
  2. Copy and paste this: https://cd/Users/junitaahammed/Desktop/Game%20Assets/Polyshics.app/%3CPolyshics%3E.app/Contents/MacOS/
  3. Leave it
  4. Have a good one, a'ight?
